modName: Daedric BAT File - Choice of all shouts and spells
summary: This BAT file will give you all Daedric armour and weapons, all shouts and spells and give you 1000000 dragon souls.
descriptionHtml:
This BAT file will give you all Daedric armour and weapons, all shouts and spells and give you 1000000 dragon souls.

What does it include?
daedricshouts - All Daedric armour and weapons, including 250 Daedric arrows. All vanilla shouts and spells. 100000 Dragon Souls.

daedricnoshouts - All Deadric armour and weapons, including 250 Daedric arrows.

How to use it:

1. Move the file to C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/Common/Skyrim
(Some of you may have to use this directory: C:/Program Files(x86)/Steam/steamapps/Common/Skyrim)
If you don't have Skyrim installed through steam, place the BAT file in the first Skyrim folder. (http://imgur.com/DBbsGwH)

2. Load your Skyrim, and load the savegame you would like edited.

3. Open console with the Tilde key. (Left of the 1 ey, above TAB key.)

4. Type the name of the BAT file you would like to use.
(daedricshouts or daedricnoshouts)
author: DFTGamers
